Bicycle Bell with Integrated LED Light: Add an LED light to the bell that can be powered by a small battery or solar panel, making it visible even in low-light conditions.
Bicycle Bell with Built-in GPS: Integrate a GPS system into the bell, allowing cyclists to track their routes and monitor their speed and distance traveled.
Bicycle Bell with Built-in Bluetooth Speaker: Add a small Bluetooth speaker to the bell that can play music or sound effects, providing an enjoyable audio experience for the cyclist.
Bicycle Bell with Smart Technology: Incorporate sensors that detect when the cyclist is in motion and automatically ring the bell, providing hands-free operation.
Bicycle Bell with Vibration Mode: Add a vibration mode that allows the bell to vibrate instead of ringing, providing a quieter option for those who prefer it.
